amendment.description: Amendment provides that private citizens have a right to a complete defense or bar to an action taken by Federal agency information collection activities that have not been cleared by OMB, which do not display a current OMB control number on the information request form, or which fail to state that the request for information is not subject to clearance under provisions.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to give private citizens the right to seek court actions to challenge federal agency information collection activities that have not been cleared by OMB and which do not display a current OMB control number on the information request form.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Crapo amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.
